mapper.select: SELECT T.*, G.NAME AS GRADE FROM TEACHER T LEFT JOIN GRADE G ON (T.GRADE_NUM = G.NUM) ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{count}

SELECT T.*, G.NAME AS GRADE FROM TEACHER T LEFT JOIN GRADE G ON (T.GRADE_NUM = G.NUM) WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TEACHER(ID, NAME, BIRTH, GRADE_NUM, MAJOR, ENTRY_DATE) VALUES(#{id}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{grade}, #{major}, #{entryDate})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TEACHER WHERE ID = #{id} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE TEACHER SET NAME = #{name}, BIRTH = #{birth}, ENTRY_DATE = #{entryDate}, GRADE_NUM = #{grade}, MAJOR = #{major}, UPD_DATE = SYSDATE() WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.delete: UPDATE TEACHER SET DEL_YN = 'Y', DEL_DATE = SYSDATE(), UPD_DATE = SYSDATE() WHERE ID = #{id}
